text: Macao is a 1952 American adventure crime movie directed by Josef von Sternberg and Nicholas Ray. It stars Robert Mitchum, Jane Russell, William Bendix, Thomas Gomez, Gloria Grahame, Brad Dexter, Edward Ashley, Emory Parnell and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1952 adventure movies Category:1952 crime movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies set in Macau Category:Movies directed by Josef von Sternberg Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Ray
title: Macao (movie)
